pages.text: These Upgrades Function Similarly:$(li)Crusher Upgrade$(li)Energy Crusher Upgrade$(br)Put an inventory (like a chest) under the pedestal for the inputs.$(br)Processed Outputs will come out the top of the pedestal, the machine will not crush any items while it already has an item in it.$(br)Connect another pedestal to the crusher one to automate the outputs.
$(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Furnace)Wiki Link/$ $(br)Drop Fuel items (Coal, Wood, Lava Buckets) on the pedestal (with 'Q' by default) to fuel it.
$(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Energy-Furnace)Wiki Link/$ $(br)You need to connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network as it'll consume energy and not require solid fuel to be used.
